thought: To craft a golden_axe, I need to craft 3 gold_ingots. To do that, I need to smelt the gold_ore in slot 23. Since slot 11 is empty, I will smelt it into that slot.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 23 to slot 11 with quantity 1
